name: Liam FitzRoy kills everyone The game Part Zero
name_original: Liam FitzRoy kills everyone The game Part Zero
description: Liam FitzRoy kills everyone The game Part Zero is a 2d shooter inspired by old 3d shooters, it has encounters and dialogues with characters that will help or hinder each one in a different way during the course of the story, the idea here is basically to shoot everything We have to see and read the dialogues to try to understand the situation of the protagonist who lost his memories.
